verses.verse: If <S%G1487><s%> there be therefore <S%G3767><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> comfort <S%G3890><s%> of love, <S%G26><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> and mercies, <S%G3628><s%>

Fulfill <S%G4137><s%> you my joy, <S%G5479><s%> that you be like minded, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5426><s%> <S%G2192><s%> having the same <S%G846><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> being of one <S%G4861><s%> accord, of one <S%G3888><s%> <S%G1520><s%> mind. <S%G5426><s%>

Let nothing <S%G3367><s%> be done through <S%G2596><s%> strife <S%G2052><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> vainglory; <S%G2754><s%> but in lowliness <S%G5012><s%> of mind <S%G5012><s%> let each <S%G240><s%> esteem <S%G2233><s%> other <S%G240><s%> better <S%G5242><s%> than themselves. <S%G1438><s%>
Look <S%G4648><s%> not every <S%G1538><s%> man on his own <S%G1438><s%> things, but every <S%G1538><s%> man also <S%G2532><s%> on the things of others. <S%G2087><s%>
Let this <S%G5124><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> be in you, which <S%G3739><s%> was also <S%G2532><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>
Who, being <S%G5225><s%> in the form <S%G3444><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> thought <S%G2233><s%> it not robbery <S%G725><s%> to be equal <S%G2470><s%> with God: <S%G2316><s%>

But made <S%G1096><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> of no <S%G5013><s%> reputation, <S%G2758><s%> and took <S%G2983><s%> on him the form <S%G3444><s%> of a servant, <S%G1401><s%> and was made <S%G1096><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of men: <S%G444><s%>

And being found <S%G2147><s%> in fashion <S%G4976><s%> as a man, <S%G444><s%> he humbled <S%G5013><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and became <S%G1096><s%> obedient <S%G5255><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> even <S%G1161><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%> of the cross. <S%G4716><s%>

Why <S%G1352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> has highly <S%G5251><s%> exalted <S%G5251><s%> him, and given <S%G5483><s%> him a name <S%G3686><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is above <S%G5228><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> name: <S%G3686><s%>

That at <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> knee <S%G1119><s%> should bow, <S%G2578><s%> of things in heaven, <S%G2032><s%> and things in earth, <S%G1919><s%> and things under <S%G2709><s%> the earth; <S%G2709><s%>

And that every <S%G3956><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> should confess <S%G1843><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is Lord, <S%G2962><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Why, <S%G5620><s%> my beloved, <S%G27><s%> as you have always <S%G3842><s%> obeyed, <S%G5219><s%> not as in my presence <S%G3952><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> in my absence, <S%G666><s%> work <S%G2716><s%> out your <S%G1438><s%> own <S%G1438><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> with fear <S%G5401><s%> and trembling. <S%G5156><s%>
For it is God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in you both <S%G2532><s%> to will <S%G2309><s%> and to do <S%G1754><s%> of his good pleasure. <S%G2107><s%>
Do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things without <S%G5565><s%> murmurings <S%G1112><s%> and disputings: <S%G1261><s%>

That you may be blameless <S%G273><s%> and harmless, <S%G185><s%> the sons <S%G5043><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> without <S%G298><s%> rebuke, <S%G298><s%> in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of a crooked <S%G4646><s%> and perverse <S%G1294><s%> nation, <S%G1074><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you shine <S%G5316><s%> as lights <S%G5458><s%> in the world; <S%G2889><s%>

Holding <S%G1907><s%> forth <S%G1907><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> that I may rejoice <S%G2745><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that I have not run <S%G5143><s%> in vain, <S%G2756><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> labored <S%G2872><s%> in vain. <S%G2756><s%>

Yes, <S%G235><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> I be offered <S%G4689><s%> on the sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> and service <S%G3009><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> I joy, <S%G5463><s%> and rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with you all. <S%G3956><s%>
For the same <S%G846><s%> cause also <S%G2532><s%> do you joy, <S%G5463><s%> and rejoice <S%G4796><s%> with me.

But I trust <S%G1679><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> shortly <S%G5030><s%> to you, that I also <S%G2504><s%> may be of good comfort, <S%G2174><s%> when I know <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> state. <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4012><s%>

For I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> like minded, <S%G2473><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> will naturally <S%G1104><s%> care <S%G3309><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> state. <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4012><s%>
For all <S%G3956><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> their own, not the things which are Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ's. <S%G5547><s%>
But you know <S%G1097><s%> the proof <S%G1382><s%> of him, that, as a son <S%G5043><s%> with the father, <S%G3962><s%> he has served <S%G1398><s%> with me in the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>
Him therefore <S%G3767><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> presently, <S%G1824><s%> so <S%G5613><s%> soon as I shall see <S%G542><s%> how <S%G4012><s%> it will go with me.
But I trust <S%G3982><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that I also <S%G2532><s%> myself shall come <S%G2064><s%> shortly. <S%G5030><s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> I supposed <S%G2233><s%> it necessary <S%G316><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> to you Epaphroditus, <S%G1891><s%> my brother, <S%G80><s%> and companion <S%G4904><s%> in labor, <S%G4904><s%> and fellow soldier, <S%G4961><s%> but your <S%G5216><s%> messenger, <S%G652><s%> and he that ministered <S%G3011><s%> to my wants. <S%G5532><s%>
For he longed <S%G1971><s%> after <S%G1971><s%> you all, <S%G3956><s%> and was full of heaviness, <S%G85><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> that you had heard <S%G191><s%> that he had been sick. <S%G770><s%>

For indeed <S%G2532><s%> he was sick <S%G770><s%> near <S%G3897><s%> to death: <S%G2288><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> had mercy <S%G1653><s%> on him; and not on him only, <S%G3440><s%> but on me also, <S%G2532><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should have <S%G2192><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> on sorrow. <S%G3077><s%>

I sent <S%G3992><s%> him therefore <S%G3767><s%> the more <S%G4708><s%> carefully, <S%G4708><s%> that, when you see <S%G1492><s%> him again, <S%G3825><s%> you may rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> and that I may be the less <S%G253><s%> sorrowful. <S%G253><s%>
Receive <S%G4327><s%> him therefore <S%G3767><s%> in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> gladness; <S%G5479><s%> and hold <S%G2192><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> in reputation: <S%G1784><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> for the work <S%G2041><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> he was near <S%G1448><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> not regarding <S%G3851><s%> his life, <S%G5590><s%> to supply <S%G378><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> lack <S%G5303><s%> of service <S%G3009><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> me.
